action.name: Multiattack
entries: The giant makes two greatclub attacks.

action.name: Greatclub
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one Medium or Smaller creature. {@h}26 ({@damage 6d6 + 5}) bludgeoning damage, the giant lands {@condition prone} in the target's space, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition prone} and suffocating. The grapple ends early if the giant stands up.

action.name: Slammie Whammie {@recharge 5}
entries: If the giant jumps at least 15 feet as part of its movement, it can then use this action to land {@condition prone} on its belly in a space that contains one or more other creatures. Each of those creatures must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength or Dexterity saving throw or take 25 ({@damage 6d6 + 5}) bludgeoning damage.(target's choice) and be {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition prone}. On a successful save, the creature takes only half the damage, isn't knocked {@condition prone}, and is pushed 5 feet out of the giant's space into an unoccupied space of the creature's choice. If no unoccupied space is within range, the creature instead falls {@condition prone} in the giant's space.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: The hill giant's long jump is up to 30 feet and its high jump is up to 15 feet, with or without a running start.
